audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - University of Michigan Men's Glee Club & Ohio State University Glee Club Joint Concert - 1953 November 21
audio_item.dc.contributor.author: University of Michigan. Men's Glee Club
audio_item.dc.rights.access: This material is available for research only in the Reading Room of the Bentley Historical Library at the University of Michigan (Ann Arbor, MI).

audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Program 8] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : The Ohio State Glee Club performs: Oh, Rejoice, Ye Christians Loudly; Ave Maria; And Now tis Time to Go; Selections by the OSUGLEECQS: Ol' Joe Clark, Tee Roo, There Is Nothin' Like A Dame, Campus Echoes, Wahoo, It's round on the end, I wanna go back, etc. Michigan Glee Club performs: Laudes Atque Carmina, A Mighty Fortress Is Our God, Care Selve, The Omnipotence. Selections by "The Novelaires" In The Silence of the Night, Nola, Luck Be A Lady, Songs of Michigan Tis of Michigan We Sing, A Toast to Michigan, I Want To Go Back To Michigan, Victors, The Old Friar's Song. Show concludes with Alma Maters by combined Glee Clubs.
